lead_paragraph: Closing with a 25-foot putt for birdie, Tom Purtzer took the lead after the second round of the Senior P.G.A. Championship on Friday in Rochester, N.Y. Purtzer, a five-time PGA Tour winner, shot a three-under-par 67 to go to even-par 140. That put him one up on Jay Haas, the first-round leader, who shot a two-over 72, and Massy Kuramoto, who finished at two under.
